attributes.action: create legislation which sets a maximum temperature in which people can work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at present there is a minimum working temperature set at 16 deg. however a maximum temperature has never been set, it is about time that such a temperature was decided upon and set as part of health and safety legislation

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
